name: Rest In Peace (itch) (friendly local air dealer)
name_original: Rest In Peace (itch) (friendly local air dealer)
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 25 game jam. The theme was 'Spirits' and the limitation was 'no text'.

Traverse the spirit dungeon and free the souls of the dead. Solve the puzzles to continue through the dungeon.

Didn't have a lot of time to work on this so hopefully it turned out alright. If you cant figure out the controls (which hopefully you can but don't blame you if you don't), use Mouse 1 to move or attack and Space to swap between moving and attacking.

: These drowned souls are immune to your attacks but will release their spirit when out of water.

: These burning souls are immune to your attacks but will release their spirit when in water.

Collect spirits to open gates that may block your path to the end of the level.
